results.title: Efficient Filtering, Sorting, Pagination, and Grouping in Node.js API with TypeORM Across Multiple Services - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Context: I’m working on an API backend using a layered architecture: Controller → Service → Repository (TypeORM) The list endpoints support: Search Filter Sort Pagination Grouping Additionally, the frontend requires metadata in the response such as: Count per group "First N items per group" Data Ownership Split: The entity is managed by.

descriptions.content: Context: I’m working on an API backend using a layered architecture: Controller → Service → Repository (TypeORM) The list endpoints support: Search Filter Sort Pagination Grouping Additionally, the frontend requires metadata in the response such as: Count per group "First N items per group" Data Ownership Split: The entity is managed by.

results.title: Case Sensitive Table Names in MySql - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: While creating the Azure Database for MySQL, it does not ask if you want to have lower_case_table_name value to be 1 or 0 which controls the case sensitivity (no for 1 and yes for 0). I'm using TypeORM and Sequelize. Way too much frustrated due to this.| Hi, @Muhammad Salman Afzal Welcome to the Microsoft Q&A forum, and sorry for the trouble.

descriptions.content: While creating the Azure Database for MySQL, it does not ask if you want to have lower_case_table_name value to be 1 or 0 which controls the case sensitivity (no for 1 and yes for 0). results.title: I am making a connection to mssql using typeorm and getting error - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Hi, I am trying to create connection to my mssql server using typeorm in node 20 application. Node version: 20.15.0 mssql: 10.11.0 Please help.| Hi @Kasthuri C M , Thank you for your reaching out and welcome to Microsoft Q&A.  ...connection gets created if I set encrypt to false.Hi, I am trying to create connection to my mssql server using.
